org.raistlic.common.assertion

Interface AssertionFactory


  • public interface AssertionFactory
    Export a collection of assertion instances for different types of candidates.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  AssertionFactory.Strategy
      The strategy of managing the expectation instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void assertThat(boolean assertion, java.lang.String message)
      Makes a claim that the specified assertion is true, or otherwise throws an exception with the message .
      PrimitiveBooleanAssertion expect(boolean candidate)
      Wraps the specified boolean candidate and returns an expectation instance to check it.

      • assertThat

        void assertThat(boolean assertion,
                java.lang.String message)
        Makes a claim that the specified assertion is true, or otherwise throws an exception with the message .
        Parameters:
        assertion - the assertion that's expected to be true.
        message - the message to throw exception with when the assertion is false.
